p: Symptomatic plants with medium and high salinity stresses exhibited decreased intensity of vibrational bands that could be assigned to pectin (747 cm –1), cellulose (915, 1048, 1068, 1115, and 1155 cm –1), xylan (1184 cm –1), carotenoids (1000, 1525, and 1545 cm –1), phenylpropanoids (∼1600 cm –1), protein (1674 cm –1), and aliphatic vibrations (1218, 1288, 1326, 1382, 1440, and 1488 cm –1) ( Figure 4).
